meanings.definition: A test administered after completion of a training program to assess knowledge or skills.
meanings.sent1: After finishing the course, the students took a posttest to show what they learned.
meanings.sent2: The teacher gave a posttest to evaluate how well the students understood the material.
meanings.sent3: The posttest results revealed that everyone had mastered the content.
meanings.sent4: Taking the posttest was like shining a light on their progress throughout the training.
meanings.sent5: The posttest was the final step to demonstrate their new skills.

meanings.definition: To administer a test after completion of a training program.
meanings.sent1: The instructor will posttest the students to measure their understanding.
meanings.sent2: Teachers often posttest their students to gauge their learning outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The students were surprised when the teacher decided to posttest them on a Friday.
meanings.sent4: Posttesting the participants will help determine the effectiveness of the training program.
meanings.sent5: She will posttest the group to ensure they have grasped the concepts.
